.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

For stable version:

`pip install z0bug_odoo`

For current version:

`cd $HOME`
`git@github.com:zeroincombenze/tools.git`
`cd $HOME/tools`
`./install_tools.sh`


|

This module is part of tools project.

Last Update / Ultimo aggiornamento: 2023-04-15
